textContent:
Replicate retail talent system but for every ability. Have between 1 and three options per tier, and 1 to three tiers. The amount of Grasp (ability points) required depends on the virtue, but it most likely increases the higher the tier. For example:
VIRTUE 1.1 : 1 Grasp/ VIRTUE 1.2 : 1 Grasp / VIRTUE 1.3 : 2 Grasp
VIRTUE 2.1 : 2 Grasp/ VIRTUE 2.2 : 3 Grasp
VIRTUE 3.1 : 4 Grasp/ VIRTUE 3.2 : 3 Grasp / VIRTUE 3.3 : 5 Grasp

Take a leaf from Magic Survival. There, you have one to two upgrades for every ability, of which you can choose between 3 options each time. These options change how the ability functions, always being an upgrade.
